title: cryptpad.fr
description: The flagship instance that is hosted and administrated by the CryptPad core development team. Premium subscriptions fund the project's continued development.

title: pad.envs.net
description: envs.net is a minimalist, non-commercial shared unix system and will always be free to use.

title: pad.c3w.at
description: This is an independent community instance of CryptPad.
